hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ali said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] forbade me from four things: Wearing garments dyed with safflower, and from wearing gold rings, and from wearing Al-Qassiyah garments, and reciting Qur'an while I am bowing

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ لُبْسِ، خَاتَمِ الذَّهَبِ
